entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0117.10093] In the statement 00000007 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows the concept us-gaap:ProceedsFromNotesPayable with a value of 1,250,000 and dimension of us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis and member of us-gaap:RelatedPartyMember is not equal to the dimensional breakdown of 1,365,000 using the dimension us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis and the second dimension srt:ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis: RelatedPartyMember --> 1,365,000 --> us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=us-gaap:RelatedPartyMember, srt:ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis=EZFL:NextNRGHoldingCorpMember
On the face financial statements it is expected that values reported are dimensionally complete for a given line item. If you added up the values of the dimensions the resulting sum should represent the actual aggregate value. This rule takes the dimensional values of an axis reported on the face financial statements and adds them up and compares them to the actual aggregate value reported anywhere in the filing. If they are different the rule reports an error.
The properties of this us-gaap:ProceedsFromNotesPayable fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-03-31 Unit : USD Dimensions : us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=us-gaap:RelatedPartyMember Rule Element Id:10093 Rule version: 26.0.10 - forms-1a.htm 23638

property.name: label
property.value: Proceeds from notes payable - related party
